notes: Can also use a negative (-) offset west of Fulton/meets on simplex every 5th Wednesday of the month at 8:30 PM then repeater at normal time.

name: WAARCI Youth Net
notes: Encouraging check-ins from hams 17 or under/18 and in high school/youth wishing to check-in via 3rd-party.
No nets 3rd Thursday of month due to club meeting.
